function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of consideration for social and environmental issues in supply chain performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on technology adoption and knowledge creation in supply chain management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"33% of works do not identify pandemic disruptions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Supply chain disruptions impact company results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenging implementation of supply chain risk management strategy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to disruptions in supply chains and logistics operations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on the impact of contagious diseases on environmental factors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited focus on social dimensions and individual-related issues related to contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative research dominance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of supply chain structure specification","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data availability and reliability challenges related to covid-19 impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of discussion on types of disruptions and strategies to solve them may lead to ineffective decision-making and policy formulation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to adequately assess the impact of supply chain disruption on performance may result in unpreparedness for contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of supply chain structure and organization may create vulnerabilities to contagious disease propagation within the network.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of journals and country of affiliation may reveal trends in research focus and funding, but may also indicate potential hotspots for contagion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High concentration of publications in specific journals may indicate a narrow focus on certain aspects of the contagion, potentially limiting the understanding of broader risk factors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"International collaboration in research may facilitate knowledge exchange, but it also carries the risk of introducing and spreading contagious diseases across borders.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mention of covid-19 and its impact on supply chain management","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study of disease spread modeling and its relevance to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of the economic impact of the pandemic on supply chains and smes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated review process due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased publication lag during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of vosviewer software to analyze co-occurrence of keywords","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Bibliometric analysis to understand the publications related to contagious diseases may overlook important insights and trends.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider the impact of global events such as covid-19 on the research landscape may result in outdated or incomplete insights.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bias in the selection of data sources for the bibliometric analysis may skew the interpretation of research trends and priorities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exponential growth of published works between 2017 and 2020","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inclusion of papers not relevant to covid-19 challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reading and analyzing a large set of manuscripts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of logical connectors in search may result in missing relevant papers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in search results due to discipline limitations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete capture of relevant publications due to time limitations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in the literature review process due to authors’ idiosyncratic decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistency in the search process when collecting and identifying research papers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of search to peer-reviewed journals may exclude relevant literature and research output from other sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragility of global supply network exposed by covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supply chain resilience and reach in operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in consumer behavior leading to increased purchasing of certain products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic and social costs associated with isolation strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for specific goods and services during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The recent outbreak of covid-19 has endangered the health of the world’s population and has hampered the global economy.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions and closure of different sectors, including farms, production plants, logistics facilities, and transportation, is unprecedented worldwide.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mandatory collective isolation i.e. ’social distancing’ has impacted consumer behavior and economic sectors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of uncertainty and instability in global supply chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper models for sustainable and effective distribution strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of the supply chain due to globalisation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public places may become hotspots for disease transmission if ventilation rates are not maximized","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate scheduling and population distribution patterns in buildings may lead to increased infection risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extended working hours and prolonged occupant presence in buildings can increase infection risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uniform population distribution pattern can reduce the number of infected people by up to 56%","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
